madhyama bas nawathumpola magin pahatha sandahan kriyakarakam sidu karanu labayi.1) bas sewawa patan ganima ha harawima pilibanda palanaya kirima ha nirikshanaya kirima2) sisan tikat alewi kirima3) shri langama bas ratha magin kolambaa simawa thula siduwana anathuru parikshanayata bhajanaya kirima4) awashya wana wita aadeshaka bas ratha dhawanaya kirima5) sinhala demala aluth awurudu uthsawa samaya, wesak aadi wishesha uthsawa awashyathawan sadaha ilakka kara ganimin bas sewawan kriyathmaka kirimaaramuna / prathilabhapasugiya kalaya thula mema bas nawathumpala hariyakarawa nadaththu nokirima hethuwen bas manginhata boho dushkarathawanta muhuna pamata sidu wiya.

aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaye puhunuwa labana upadhidharingen siyayata 70 k kanthawan wana bawada ema amathyanshaya kiyayi.gramiya mattamin pathkaranu labana me niladharin abhiyoga jayagatha haki nayakayaku bawata path kirimata sadaha awashya paurusha wardhanaya kirima wenuwen thriwidha hamudawe sahaya athiwa puhunuwim labadima, game prajawage awashyathawayan saha abhiyogayan hadunagena ema abhiyoga ganima sadaha nayakathwaya gena katayuthu kalayuthu aakaraya pilibada danuwath kirima saha diwi naguma jathika wyaparaya pilibada danuwath kirima aadi karunu sambandhayen awadhanaya yomu kirima me wadamuluwe mulika paramarthayan we.mahinda chinthana prathipaththi prakashaye sadahan pudgalaya hada pawula hadannath, pawula hada gama hadannath yana sankalpaya kriyathmaka kirime wagakima me upadhidharinta pawarena bawada game nayakathwaya gena gama sanwardhanaya kirima sadaha awashya salasum sakas kirima thulin game dilidubawa thuran kirime karyabharaya mowun wetha pawarena bawada aarthika sanwardhana niyojya amathi hisabulla mahatha kiya sitiyeya..
